description: Villagers mourned Mudasir Ahmed, one of four suspected rebels killed in Redwani, in Indian-controlled Kashmir. Mr. Ahmed died in a 12-hour-long battle with Indian security forces.
title: Kashmiri Militants Killed in Gun Battle
title_page: Kashmiri Militants Killed in Gun Battle - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Villagers mourned Mudasir Ahmed, one of four suspected rebels killed in Redwani, in Indian-controlled Kashmir. Mr. Ahmed died in a 12-hour-long battle with Indian security forces.
